# Makes some Vectors
Everything gets assigned to the same class, so 4 returns as "4"
```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yello")

# Check class
class(marmots)
?typeof
?class
```

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 8.5)

# Check Class
class(pika)


# SCALAR MULTIPLIER

scalar_pika <- 5.2 * pika
scalar_pika
```

```{r}
bananas <- c(1, 2, 3)
apples <- c(6, 7,8)
 

bananas + apples
bananas - apples
## DOT PRODUCT
bananas %*% apples
```
